title: Low FPS with gtx 1080
body:
I upgraded from a gtx 780 to 1080 with a 144 hertz monitor. I expected my computer to handle a game like league of legends consistenly at 144 fps but even after the upgrade I still get the exact same fps. Monitoring my hardware while playing show me my CPU and GPU is barely used. I'd like to point out this issue only occur with League of Legends, I tested on Witcher 3, Rise of the tomb rider and overwatch. All games got an average increase of 120% but league 0%, nothing.

Intel i7-4770k
GTX 1080
16GB ram 2400mhz

replies.body:
I have a 
Ryzen 7 1800x 
16gb of ram at 2400hz 
z370 motherboard 
GTX1080 and im only getting roughly 50/90fps for some reason when i should easily be getting 130+
I found out the game just suck with 1070 & 1080.
..OH NO POOR YOU! It still *only* plays at 144 FPS ? It must be so terrible ! I can't even begin to imagine your pain! https://gifrific.com/woody-harrelson-wiping-his-tears-with-money/ {{item:3301}}

> [{quoted}](name=kcal12,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hcy1LL94,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-09T01:51:45.686+0000)
>
> ..OH NO POOR YOU! It still *only* plays at 144 FPS ? It must be so terrible ! I can't even begin to imagine your pain! https://gifrific.com/woody-harrelson-wiping-his-tears-with-money/ {{item:3301}}

You don't get the point, I PAID for performance, so I SHOULD have. and I'm getting 100 to 144 up and down which is worse than a stable 60 fps.

Hi, I recently bought a new gaming pc to mainly play league to start of with the FPS was fine getting easily 140 but now Iâ€™m getting around 20-40 FPS very occasionally 

Specs are gtx1050ti 
Ryzen 5 1500x
B350 plus motherboard 
8bg ram
Can anyone help me out please?

If your pc is[ too good](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) you can run into problems.  Check that guide out, but usually just selecting a frame cap via in-game options can help.

If the issue persists, though, you might have general driver or game file issues dropping frames.  The steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help with that!
